short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change default search engine to make Web Bear Search your default search in Chrome browser omnibox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Web Bear Search" extension allows you to quickly and more efficiently search for the desired text directly through the address bar (omnibox) in the "Web Bear Search" engine.

Features of "Web Bear Search" extension:
- Fast and simple installation
- Free and safe Google Chrome extension

Terms of Use: https://webbearsearch.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://webbearsearch.com/privacy.html

By click on the "Add to Chrome" button and installing the "Web Bear Search" extension, you are agreeing to install this extension, you are agreeing Privacy Policy, and you are agreeing Terms of Use.
